card_text: The yields consist of voting rewards from TRON governance and yields from Energy rental
introduction_text_1: stUSDT is a receipt token earned when staking USD stablecoins. Through the stUSDT-RWA Contract, users can unstake and redeem stUSDT back into USDT at a 1:1 ratio (subject to specific conditions). A Rebase mechanism ensures continuous reward distribution. Funds in the contract are allocated to short-term government bonds, meaning the longer you hold stUSDT, the higher the potential rewards.
introduction_text_2: Security is always our highest priority. However, tokens used for staking here are issued and managed by third-party companies. You can visit websites of <highlight1>USDT</highlight1> and <highlight1>TUSD</highlight1> to learn more about the tokens for better-informed decisions.

faq.question: How safe is it to connect a wallet to the site?
faq.answer: Connecting a wallet only shows your address to the site but does not give permission to spend funds. This is standard practice for dApps.

faq.question: Why should I trust the site?
faq.answer: Our site follows best practices for security and user privacy.

faq.question: Why should I trust the site?
faq.answer: We are open source and community reviewed.

faq.question: Is there KYC?
faq.answer: No KYC is required for using our platform.

section_title_how_to_1: How you earn and maximize your staking rewards with us

blog.heading: Learn About Crypto with TRX Prime

posts.title: How Does Crypto Staking Work?
posts.excerpt: Crypto staking allows users to lock their tokens to support blockchain networks and earn rewards. Instead of mining, staking uses a proof-of-stake (PoS) mechanism that is more energy-efficient and accessible.

subheadings.title: What Is Staking?
subheadings.content: Staking is the process of holding cryptocurrency in a wallet to support the operations of a blockchain network. By locking tokens, users help validate transactions and secure the network.

subheadings.title: How Rewards Are Generated
subheadings.content: Rewards are distributed as new tokens or transaction fees. The more tokens you stake, the higher your potential earnings.

subheadings.title: Risks of Staking
subheadings.content: While staking can be profitable, it involves risks such as price volatility, lock-up periods, and potential network vulnerabilities.

subheadings.title: Conclusion
subheadings.content: Staking is a popular way to earn passive income with crypto while contributing to the security of blockchain networks.

posts.title: Crypto Restaking: A Complete Guide
posts.excerpt: Restaking is a new DeFi strategy that allows stakers to maximize their rewards by reusing staked assets across multiple protocols. It enhances yield opportunities but comes with higher risks.

subheadings.title: What Is Restaking?
subheadings.content: Restaking involves taking your already-staked tokens and using them again in other protocols to generate additional rewards.

subheadings.title: Benefits of Restaking
subheadings.content: Restaking can increase capital efficiency, multiply yields, and support emerging DeFi projects.

subheadings.title: Risks of Restaking
subheadings.content: The risks include smart contract vulnerabilities, liquidity issues, and higher exposure to market volatility.

subheadings.title: Conclusion
subheadings.content: Restaking can be a powerful tool for advanced investors, but it requires careful risk management.

posts.title: How to Earn Cryptocurrency
posts.excerpt: There are multiple ways to earn cryptocurrency: staking, mining, trading, providing liquidity, and even play-to-earn games. Each method has its own risks and rewards.

subheadings.title: Staking and Yield Farming
subheadings.content: Staking tokens or providing liquidity to DeFi pools are popular ways to earn passive income.

subheadings.title: Mining and Node Operation
subheadings.content: Running mining rigs or blockchain nodes can generate crypto rewards, though it often requires high investment.

subheadings.title: Play-to-Earn and Airdrops
subheadings.content: Gamers can earn crypto through play-to-earn games, while airdrops reward early adopters of new projects.

subheadings.title: Conclusion
subheadings.content: From staking to gaming, earning cryptocurrency has never been more accessible to users worldwide.

features.text: No account creation or sign-up necessary
Protecting your privacy comes first for us

exchangeSteps.title: Stake your tokens
exchangeSteps.description: Safely delegate your tokens with complete control. We distributes them among the best validators, generating consistent staking rewards.

exchangeSteps.title: Get a liquid staking token
exchangeSteps.description: Your staked position is reflected in a token equal to your asset plus the rewards that build up daily. Enjoy immediate unstaking and full liquidity access.

exchangeSteps.title: Let your tokens work for you
exchangeSteps.description: Boost your returns by using the value-accruing token in DeFi — join AMMs, borrow, or lend against it to expand your rewards.
